body:
[klenvastergan](https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan)

According to arkitekt on Discord, he got a 7 day ban, while his alts got permabanned.

Apparently fifthfiend was one of his alts (well, that's unfortunate because I used to look at his post history to find posts about Ruqqus censorship...)

According to captainmeta4, "temp ban users are protected from siege", but that doesn't seem to be the case right now. As an example, +Klenvastergan got sieged by @AsininePorcupine

He's using the account @Klenny right now, I think.

Note: The 10 guild limit was not stated in the [TOS](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025147/https://ruqqus.com/help/terms) or [Content Policy](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025514/https://ruqqus.com/help/rules) at the time of the ban. @captainmeta4 says that it counted as "[breaking ruqqus](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzox)".

Edit: [The admins are discussing the possibility of adding a line like "don't use multiple accounts to circumvent per-user limitations" to the TOS](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzqm).

Edit 2020-11-29:

Another one of his alts was JennaThorne. On that account, he modded guilds like [LGBDropTheT](https://archive.is/V2FkY), [GenderCynical](https://archive.is/R0u5P), [RuqqusDrama](https://archive.is/Wa88B), [GBTDropTheL](https://archive.is/xhKFA), [bdsm, and Censored](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2e8l). Around July 2020, he apparently "bullied" WillieOffThePickleBoat [by yanking his posts to the last two guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2gbk).

Edit 2020-12-04: [Oh, uh, well then](https://ruqqus.com/+DeuxRAMA/post/5gj1/after-all-the-whining-i-did)

Edit 2020-12-09: [Apparently @norferner and @brisbane got banned for the same reason too. Hm, I wonder who they were.](https://ruqqus.com/+unitedkingdom/post/5lo8/meta-this-guild-is-under-new)

**Update on 2020-11-27:**

The admins have put out an announcement on the upcoming TOS update. You can view it [here](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27).

@klenvastergan will indeed be [getting his guilds back](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27/i3hp).
body_html:
klenvastergan

According to arkitekt on Discord, he got a 7 day ban, while his alts got permabanned.

Apparently fifthfiend was one of his alts (well, that's unfortunate because I used to look at his post history to find posts about Ruqqus censorship...)

According to captainmeta4, "temp ban users are protected from siege", but that doesn't seem to be the case right now. As an example, +Klenvastergan got sieged by @AsininePorcupine

He's using the account @Klenny right now, I think.

Note: The 10 guild limit was not stated in the TOS or Content Policy at the time of the ban. @captainmeta4 says that it counted as "breaking ruqqus".

Edit: The admins are discussing the possibility of adding a line like "don't use multiple accounts to circumvent per-user limitations" to the TOS.

Edit 2020-11-29:

Another one of his alts was JennaThorne. On that account, he modded guilds like LGBDropTheT, GenderCynical, RuqqusDrama, GBTDropTheL, bdsm, and Censored. Around July 2020, he apparently "bullied" WillieOffThePickleBoat by yanking his posts to the last two guilds.

Edit 2020-12-04: Oh, uh, well then

Edit 2020-12-09: Apparently @norferner and @brisbane got banned for the same reason too. Hm, I wonder who they were.

Update on 2020-11-27:

The admins have put out an announcement on the upcoming TOS update. You can view it here.

@klenvastergan will indeed be getting his guilds back.

title: @klenvastergan banned for using multiple accounts to bypass the 10 guild limit

The admins have put out an announcement on the upcoming TOS update. You can view it here.

@klenvastergan will indeed be getting his guilds back.

post.body:
[klenvastergan](https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan)

According to arkitekt on Discord, he got a 7 day ban, while his alts got permabanned.

Apparently fifthfiend was one of his alts (well, that's unfortunate because I used to look at his post history to find posts about Ruqqus censorship...)

According to captainmeta4, "temp ban users are protected from siege", but that doesn't seem to be the case right now. As an example, +Klenvastergan got sieged by @AsininePorcupine

He's using the account @Klenny right now, I think.

Note: The 10 guild limit was not stated in the [TOS](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025147/https://ruqqus.com/help/terms) or [Content Policy](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025514/https://ruqqus.com/help/rules) at the time of the ban. @captainmeta4 says that it counted as "[breaking ruqqus](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzox)".

Edit: [The admins are discussing the possibility of adding a line like "don't use multiple accounts to circumvent per-user limitations" to the TOS](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzqm).

Edit 2020-11-29:

Another one of his alts was JennaThorne. On that account, he modded guilds like [LGBDropTheT](https://archive.is/V2FkY), [GenderCynical](https://archive.is/R0u5P), [RuqqusDrama](https://archive.is/Wa88B), [GBTDropTheL](https://archive.is/xhKFA), [bdsm, and Censored](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2e8l). Around July 2020, he apparently "bullied" WillieOffThePickleBoat [by yanking his posts to the last two guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2gbk).

Edit 2020-12-04: [Oh, uh, well then](https://ruqqus.com/+DeuxRAMA/post/5gj1/after-all-the-whining-i-did)

Edit 2020-12-09: [Apparently @norferner and @brisbane got banned for the same reason too. Hm, I wonder who they were.](https://ruqqus.com/+unitedkingdom/post/5lo8/meta-this-guild-is-under-new)

**Update on 2020-11-27:**

The admins have put out an announcement on the upcoming TOS update. You can view it [here](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27).

@klenvastergan will indeed be [getting his guilds back](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27/i3hp).

author.bio_html:

body:
The admins are even trying to double down on it by saying "it's common sense"\* or "[it's breaking ruqqus](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzox)", but anyways, [they'll be clarifying this rule in an update later](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzqm). I don't know if they'll unban Klenny and give him his guilds back though. (I hope they will, but I can't say that I have high hopes for this.)

\*kek said this in the discord, saying he was trying to imitate Klenny:

>"uhhh duhhh it wasn't explicitly mentioned in the ToS uhh duhh admins are biased uhhh duhh I don't have common sense"

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

The admins are even trying to double down on it by saying "it's common sense"* or "it's breaking ruqqus", but anyways, they'll be clarifying this rule in an update later. "uhhh duhhh it wasn't explicitly mentioned in the ToS uhh duhh admins are biased uhhh duhh I don't have common sense"

body:
Common sense is knowing that retroactive punishments for rules created on the fly is retarded and gay. The onus is on the admins to write a TOS that reflects their intentions for user behavior.

On the three points of folly regarding this event every point was handled incorrectly. (TOS mistake, retroactive punishment, doubling down on being wrong).
body_html:
Common sense is knowing that retroactive punishments for rules created on the fly is retarded and gay. The onus is on the admins to write a TOS that reflects their intentions for user behavior.

On the three points of folly regarding this event every point was handled incorrectly. (TOS mistake, retroactive punishment, doubling down on being wrong).

post.body:
[klenvastergan](https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan)

According to arkitekt on Discord, he got a 7 day ban, while his alts got permabanned.

Apparently fifthfiend was one of his alts (well, that's unfortunate because I used to look at his post history to find posts about Ruqqus censorship...)

According to captainmeta4, "temp ban users are protected from siege", but that doesn't seem to be the case right now. As an example, +Klenvastergan got sieged by @AsininePorcupine

He's using the account @Klenny right now, I think.

Note: The 10 guild limit was not stated in the [TOS](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025147/https://ruqqus.com/help/terms) or [Content Policy](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025514/https://ruqqus.com/help/rules) at the time of the ban. @captainmeta4 says that it counted as "[breaking ruqqus](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzox)".

Edit: [The admins are discussing the possibility of adding a line like "don't use multiple accounts to circumvent per-user limitations" to the TOS](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzqm).

Edit 2020-11-29:

Another one of his alts was JennaThorne. On that account, he modded guilds like [LGBDropTheT](https://archive.is/V2FkY), [GenderCynical](https://archive.is/R0u5P), [RuqqusDrama](https://archive.is/Wa88B), [GBTDropTheL](https://archive.is/xhKFA), [bdsm, and Censored](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2e8l). Around July 2020, he apparently "bullied" WillieOffThePickleBoat [by yanking his posts to the last two guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2gbk).

Edit 2020-12-04: [Oh, uh, well then](https://ruqqus.com/+DeuxRAMA/post/5gj1/after-all-the-whining-i-did)

Edit 2020-12-09: [Apparently @norferner and @brisbane got banned for the same reason too. Hm, I wonder who they were.](https://ruqqus.com/+unitedkingdom/post/5lo8/meta-this-guild-is-under-new)

**Update on 2020-11-27:**

The admins have put out an announcement on the upcoming TOS update. You can view it [here](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27).

@klenvastergan will indeed be [getting his guilds back](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27/i3hp).

@klenvastergan will indeed be getting his guilds back.
post.title: @klenvastergan banned for using multiple accounts to bypass the 10 guild limit
